reviews.review: Portal 1 con una storia! Non credevo fosse possibile migliorare Portal, ma ce l'hanno fatta. All'inizio il cambio di contesto mi ha dato un po' fastidio, ma i nuovi livelli nel "backstage" di Aperture Corp. sono molto, molto belli.
очень классная игра всем рекомендую. очень классный юмористический сюжет. испытания не такие сложные - это радует! хотелось-бы что-бы вышел фильм portal 2.

if you think about awesome game for play and you dont like to play some free online [spoiler] Shits [/spoiler] <---- ( dont put your mouse here its abousive word ) than go play portal 2 its awesome game ! [h1] thumbs up from me ! [/h1]

Tato recenze bude zahrnovat všechny aspekty hry kromě co-op, protož nemám kamarády :(
Nebude zde shrnutí příběhu protože by vám to zbytečně zkazilo zážitek.

Základní info:

Portal 2 je logická sci-fi hra. Hlavní a jedinou zbraní/nastrojem je vaše věrná "Portal gun." Puzzly budete řešit pomocí dvou porálů, které budete střílet na bílé plochy pro ně určené. Herní doba single playeru je asi 6-11 hodin-záleží na tom komu to lépe myslí (mě osobně to trvalo cca 8 hodin).

Klady:

-velmi jednoduchá mechanika, která neomrzí
-zábavné charaktery které neomrzí poslouchat -> opravdu se zasmějete
-hra neobsahuje pouze klasické místnosti ve stylu dostaň se tam a pujdeš do dalšího levelu

Zápory:

-celkem krátká herní doba

Fakta:

-hra vás nevodí za ručičku, cestu si musíte najít sami (pro některé klad, pro některé zápor)

Rady:

-pečlivě se dívejte kolem sebe a hledejte plošky na portaly
-postavy někdy nemluví srozumitelně -> v nastavení si zapněte titulky

Shrnutí:

Portal 2 bude mít navždy speciální místečko v mém srdci. Úžasná hra kterou by si každý měl zahrát.

Hodnocení: 95/100

Pokud vám recenze přišla užitečná, nezapomňte ji ohodnotit!

It's a really fun puzzle game which will test your problem solving skills. The rooms start off easy and get progressively harder. The story is pretty much filler, but I had a couple of laughs at the corny jokes and the dialogue.

I also played a few levels of co-op with a friend and it was so much more fun. The co-op rooms are a bit harder, since you need to work together to solve the puzzles. You both need to portal seperate things at the same time to progress the levels.

All in all, a very fun game. The only downside is that it took me about 10 hours to play through the entire single player mode. That leaves me a bit dissatisfied. I like to see at least 20 hours played out of any game I like when I look at my games, but I cba to play through the same puzzles again.
头好晕
结局被GLaDOS送上去的时候还以为这下又要开始解密逃生，没想到是个惊喜，很感动。不错的游戏，我会把它推荐给朋友。

Portal 2 is an innovative puzzle game with a hilarious, well written narrative attached to a very interesting story. Details about the game's backstory and plot are interweaved throughout the game in hilarious and sometimes surprisingly ominous ways, and the game as a whole was nothing short of incredible in almost every respect. Even though I heard nothing but praise about this game before playing it myself, I was still surprised by just how fantastic it was. Portal 2 is nearly perfect, and I can't say that there's currently anything like it in the gaming world, nor can I say there ever will be in the future. 

If you're wondering whether or not you should buy this game, the question you should really be asking youorself is whether or not you should buy this game as well as the original Portal, and the answer is yer. Oh my god, yes. Play the original Portal, then play Portal 2. Both of them are fantastic, and I would love nothing better than to describe them both and how beautifully well put together and utterly revolutionary they were in every respect, but to spoil anything about the experience would be a crime in itself. Please, purchase and enjoy these products right now if you haven't already.

Overall Review = 9.7/10
A masterpiece that's hardly a stone's throw away from perfect

Большинство людей считают сюжет этой игры довольно простым, а саму игру довольно весёлой. Однако матерые игроки знают, что Valve не дураки и размениваться пустышкой не будут.Чем чаще вы станете обращать внимание на мелочи в игре, чем больше станете вглядываться в диалоги, рисунки и надписи, тем скорее вы поймете, сколь на самом деле пугающим является сюжет этой игры. Спойлерить не буду, но просто совет - не верьте кажущейся простоте происходящего, все куда глубже и страшнее...
Pew pew, whub, splash and screaming.

To put it simply, if you don't like this game then you clearly aren't human.

If you are debating about getting this game then what are you waiting for? It was released over 5 years ago !So if you have any worries about getting this game then you are also not human.


But seriously this is my favourite game and franchise by far, would recommend it to anyone even if they don't like puzzle games. This is one of valve's finest games of all time along with the Half-Life trilogy. This is a truely innovative franshise that has made a great impact on gaming as a whole, a must buy even when it isn't on sale!

Portal 2: A 3D-puzzly game.

(Actually enjoyed this game, playing it for the second time right now..)

Good things about this game:

- More then enough gameplay (About 6-8 hours)
- Fun Co-op levels (More then 40 levels...?)
- Submission of your own created levels (and others)
- Endless loop of portals. YUY!
- Increasing difficulty per chapter/level (Yes, I know. The controls were already hard enough [insert lenny])

Bad things about this game:

"Don't expect anything to stand here. 'Cause this is Portal 2."


Short Summary: Must-buy for people who have friends (...i am lonely...) and like to solve puzzles!

Yo no era muy de juegos estilo puzzle hasta que probé a jugar la saga Portal la cual me la recomendó un amigo. ¡El juego me ha encantado! Su mecánica es muy original y muy entretenida. aunque en algunos puzzles casi reviento (es verdad xD) al final siempre me he animado a completarlos al momento porque siempre tenía ganas de continuar avanzar ^^ 

¡Me ha encantado todo! La historia, los personajes, sus toques de humor xDD, la música, el modo cooperativo....que por cierto, ¡el modo cooperativo tambien incluye una pequeña historia! (que no diré nada por el spoiler xD) Eso de poder jugar con un amigo mola muchísimo! Y lo mejor de todo es que cabe la posibilidad de crear tus propias habitaciones de pruebas y compartirlas con los demás o probar la de otros jugadores en la workshop de Steam.

Merece mucho la pena este juego. Yo antes lo conocía pero sólo de escucharlo en internet, no sabía lo que me estaba perdiendo...
非常有创意的游戏，虽然出来时间也算早，但是现在玩一点也不过时。
Świetna gra, nie zdążyłem ukończyć je jeszcze całej, ale mam zamiar to zrobić, gdy tylko się zainstaluje na nowym komputerze! Nawet na starszym, bo pięcioletnim, laptopie, nie zacinała się.

Portal 2: personajes muy carismaticos y divertidos al punto de encariñarte con su distinguida personalidad.

historia interesante y te invita a indagar e imaginar el contexto por vos mismo dandote ciertas pautas y teniendo encuenta que transcurre en el mismo universo de Half life.

Jugabilidad fluida y sin problemas,la simple idea de poder abrir portales ya abre una frontera jugable que no se encuentra facilmente. hay que aclarar que es un juego de resolucion de problemas mediante el metodo cientifico, sabiendo eso es claro esperar situaciones que te empujen a pensar y no tanto a usar la violencia en situaciones de extremo peligro...aun asi el juego sabe como generar la accion y no dejar que te aburras mientras intentas resolver los problemas de cada sala.

Graficos propios del source engine ya visto en titulos como Half life 2 solo que mejorado y llevado a un punto donde resulta sobrecojedor dando texturas acordes a la geometria, iluminacion acorde al contexto, resolucion de sombras aceptables y lo que mas resalta esteticamente son las animaciones, tanto de personajes como del escenario en general.

Banda sonora como pocas...y lo digo porque es de esas bandas sonoras que te dejan huella y la recordaras por el resto de tu vida... canciones y melodias muy acorde a la situacion y contexto. las voces al español son muy aceptables y bien actuadas. cancion final epica como la del portal 1.

Multijugador bastante bien logrado, tanto la campaña multijugador como la opcion de crear salas o la de jugar salas creadas por la comunidad para un jugador o para 2 jugadores lo cual hace que si te quedaste con ganas de mas ahi encontraras mas retos.

Calificacion: 9/10 (porque soy muy detallista y siempre veo cosas por mejorar)

Recomendable? si, el precio es bueno y vale la pena sin duda. un buen juego que no podes no jugar.
一款非常好玩的益智类 游戏 剧情的代入感很强 强烈推荐

这款游戏真心很好，老实说我很喜欢这游戏，不管是传送门1还是2都非常有意思，特别是玩到最后那种迷の感动，对了g姐唱的歌也很好听，我还是比较喜欢传送门1的结尾曲，传送门2的双人模式也很有意思，把官方地图打爆了还有创意工坊，这点真是太赞了，总之，这是一款非常好的游戏，最后问问G胖会数3吗？！

Great sequel to Portal without suffering from sequelitis. Lots of the same humor I saw in Portal, buffed out a bit and made better for this game.

Co-op took me a while to get to (hard to schedule friends, sheesh), but it has been really fun. I was kind of disappointed that the really tricky levels that require a lot of communication, teamwork, and thinking outside of the box only came in the last stage and a half, but maybe I'm just too hardcore for it. Perhaps the community levels will help with that.

If you play co-op, arrange for voice chat with your partner, even if it's just Steam's built-in voice chat. You will struggle needlessly without it.
Valve took up the idea of Portal and made Portal 2 the most innovative game of all time. Soon afterwards, the amazing community took over and made it absolutely the best game ever!
Amazing game and in my opinion, the better of the two, although the first is FAR from a bad game, it was good, and all Portal 2 did was improve on something good, that = more good.

Now that I've gotten all the achievements and given up so much of my life to science, it's time to review this outstanding game.

--[i]Pros[/i]--
♥ Witty and honestly perfect dialogue
♥ Memorable characters and references
♥ potatoes
♥ Amazing soundtrack
♥ Creative puzzles
♥ Co-Op
♥ Cute mutants
♥ Lemons and a snazzy Cave
♥ $60
♥ You can seriously replay this game over and over again, I'm living proof of it with 150+ hours
♥ Amazing community maps that you can always play if you want more pizzazz

--[i]Cons[/i]--
♦ Neurotoxin
♦ Being called fat
♦ The cake is a lie
♦ Does not include friends for co-op (But there's always a companion cube for you lonely people)
♦ You can't eat the potato
♦ Birds

第一人称射击类空间解谜游戏，4.5/5

+较前作而言，补充了世界观，对背景故事的探索大概可以了解游戏（测试）的意义所在
+虽然具体的玩法就是那么几种，但是各种解谜要素的组合搭配使游戏一直保持着较高的可玩性
+为数不多的角色的出镜率和存在感都很高，但是玩家作为一个不能参与的主角，自我感觉就是深藏功与名啊
+双人模式很有意思
